issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: When try to create many volumes( eg. 100 or more), some volumes stay at “creating” status and never enter ‘available’ status.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
After run an ebs instance, there is not error feedback, but the instance is not running because Total Volume Size Limit Exceeded.
the error log in cloudoutput.log as follow:

2013-06-04 17:00:10 ERROR | Failed to create volume: com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.Volume@18db6028
com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceDispatchException: Failed to send message CreateStorageVolumeType to service StorageInternal because:
Total Volume Size Limit Exceeded volume: vol-3BC536E9

        at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.send(ServiceContext.java:181)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests.sendSync(AsyncRequests.java:113)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.Volumes$2.fire(Volumes.java:388)

        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.save(Transactions.java:283)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.Volumes.createStorageVolume(Volumes.java:381)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.run.ClusterAllocator.setupVolumeMessages(ClusterAllocator.java:254)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.run.ClusterAllocator.<init>(ClusterAllocator.java:186)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.run.ClusterAllocator.<init>(ClusterAllocator.java:125)

        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166)
        at com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$Queue.run(Threads.java:682)
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:471)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1110)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:603)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679)
Caused by: com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceDispatchException: Total Volume Size Limit Exceeded volume: vol-3BC536E9
        at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.send(ServiceContext.java:195)
        ... 20 more
Caused by: edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.VolumeSizeExceededException: Total Volume Size Limit Exceeded volume: vol-3BC536E9
